meanings: so to speak, as it were

vlive.korean: 되게 그냥 거창하게 말하자면... To make it sound big... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [KANGDANIEL] 녜리는 얼굴만 보여줘도 임팩트 MAX💙 (KANGDANIEL's spoiling V)
그럼 하나만 더 말하자면 나도 그럼 가사로! - 가사 뭐? So I'll do another one in lyrics. - Which one? 듣기 View video NCT : 정맠💚
vlive.english: So I'll do another one in lyrics. - Which one?

vlive.korean: [다시 한번 말하자면 세븐틴의 신년카드 만들기] - 신년카드를 만드는 거예요 - 아 신년카드~ We are making New Year's card. - Ah New Year's card. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] 세븐틴의 2020 운수대통 신년카드② (SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: We are making New Year's card. - Ah New Year's card.

vlive.korean: "껌딱지즈 서로의 장점 중 하나를 말하자면?" "You two are always together. If you were asked to say the other one's one strong point?" 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈&휴닝카이 : 뚝딱뚝딱 공작시간
vlive.english: "You two are always together. If you were asked to say the other one's one strong point?"

vlive.korean: "다시 말하자면...." "In other words.." 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 3

examples.korean: I would say. 발음듣기 말하자면. Practical English Conversation Dictionary
As a rough guide, allow half a cup of rice per person. 발음듣기 대강의 지침으로 (말하자면), 쌀을 일인분에 반 컵으로 잡아라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As a rough guide, allow half a cup of rice per person. 발음

examples.korean: In all fairness to him, he did try to stop her leaving. 발음듣기 그에게 공평하게 말하자면, 그녀가 떠나는 것을 막으려고 그가 애를 쓰기는 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In all fairness to him, he did try to stop her leaving. 발음

examples.korean: She is, figuratively speaking, holding a gun to his head. 발음듣기 그녀는, 비유적으로 말하자면, 그의 머리에 총을 들이대고 있는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is, figuratively speaking, holding a gun to his head. 발음

examples.korean: You’ll find her very helpful—if she’s not too busy, that is. 발음듣기 그녀가 아주 도움이 될 거예요. 말하자면, 그녀가 너무 바쁘지만 않으면요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’ll find her very helpful—if she’s not too busy, that is. 발음
